name: directoryUrl
description: (required) URL of the directory that lists the file names containing messages

name: urlFieldDelimiter
description: (default = underscore) Delimiter for fields within the filenames.

name: urlTimePos
description: (default=3) Position of time within the delimited file name (1=first pos)

name: urlIdPos
description: (default=5) Position of the transport medium ID within the file name (1=first pos)

name: urlTimeFormat
description: (default = HHmmss) SimpleDateFormat format string for time in the filename

name: urlTimeZone
description: (default = UTC) Time Zone for the time within the directory and file names
